column2: The coffee machine should be started, when there is a command (signal) from the mobile phone or other functions.
The coffee machine should be off, when there is no starting command (signal) from the mobile phone or other functions.
The starting of the coffee machine should be realtime, when there is a command from the mobile phone or ther functions.
When there is a harmful environment condition, the coffee machine should have the capability to reconize it and change to a safe mode.
When the coffee machine is operating, it should not be interfered by the human factors.
